name: Test4 (michaeleekk)
description:
Hello ! This is my first simple Platformer game ! Hope you will like it !

There are 3 stages now !

Controls:

Arrow Left / Arrow Right: Move
Arrow Up: Jump

* Browser version could only be loaded in Chrome right now.
* Doesn't support mobile right now.
* Browser version will take a few minutes to load. If you don't want to wait, you could download the desktop version for now :)
